message: No matter how you plan to vote, this should bother you immensely. That the Russians would SO want Trump president, that they'd pull a stunt like this. If they can get into the DNC, they can certainly get into the RNC and if you think there weren't incriminating emails over there, well, I've got some ocean front property in AZ you may be interested in. A foreign country should have no part in deciding an American election.
